message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price, perhaps around $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $100?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  I'm getting closer to my budget. Could you do $95?

I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $105?
